item.name: Apple

item.name: Banana
item.description: banana is an elongated, edible fruit - botanically a berry - produced by several kinds of large herbaceous flowering plants in the genus Musa.

item.name: Grape
item.description: The grapefruit (Citrus × paradisi) is a subtropical citrus tree known for its relatively large, sour to semi-sweet, somewhat bitter fruit.

item.name: Mango

item.name: Orange
item.description: An orange is a fruit of various citrus species in the family Rutaceae ); it primarily refers to Citrus × sinensis, which is also called sweet orange
